<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_93575</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_93575</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Les substances ont eu besoin pour la croissance de  plantes</string>
            <string language="en">Substances needed for plant growth</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Substanzen benötigten für Betriebswachstum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As substâncias necessitaram para o crescimento de
planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le sostanze hanno avuto bisogno di per sviluppo di
pianta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ουσίες που απαιτούνται για την αύξηση εγκαταστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las sustancias necesitaron para el crecimiento 
vegetal</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme prouve qu'hormis l'eau, les plantes  prennent également d'autres substances afin de se développer.  Notez la quantité de sol restant après cinq ans.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that aside from water, plants take in other substances also in order to grow.  Note the amount of soil left after five years.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">croissance de plantes</string>
            <string language="en">plant growth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">sol</string>
            <string language="en">soil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">sunlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">eau</string>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß neben Wasser, Betriebe
in anderen Substanzen auch nehmen, um zu wachsen. Beachten Sie 
die Menge des Bodens nach links nach fünf Jahren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que com exceção da água, 
as plantas fazem exame em outras substâncias também a fim crescer. 
Anote a quantidade de solo à esquerda após cinco anos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che oltre ad acqua, le piante
prendono in altre sostanze egualmente per svilupparsi. Noti la 
quantità di terreno a sinistra dopo cinque anni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι εκτός από το ύδωρ, 
φυτεύει παίρνει σε άλλες ουσίες προκειμένου να αυξηθεί επίσης. 
Σημειώστε το ποσό χώματος που αφήνεται μετά από πέντε 
έτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que aparte del agua, las 
plantas toman en otras sustancias también para crecer. Observe 
la cantidad de suelo a la izquierda después de cinco años.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betriebswachstum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Boden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tageslicht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">crescimento de planta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">solo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz solar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">água</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sviluppo di pianta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">terreno</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce solare</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">acqua</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αύξηση εγκαταστάσεων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χώμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φως του ήλιου</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ύδωρ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">crecimiento vegetal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">suelo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">luz del sol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">agua</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
